lmn_hugh.lmn.add_data package¶

Submodules¶

lmn_hugh.lmn.add_data.random_artist module¶

Generate random artists for the database.

lmn.add_data.random_artist.add_random_artist(min_length, max_length)¶

Adds an artist with a random name to the database.

Parameters

  • min_length – the minimum length, in letters, of the randomly generated artist’s name

  • max_length – the maximum length, in letters, of the randomly generated artist’s name

Raises

ValueError – if max_length is less than min_length

Module contents¶

lmn
